Comment: Leadership in wealth comes from leadership in information and technology, which comes from where? If you guessed something other than math and science, then you might be one of the people who got us into this mess.   Like the internet? Science. Like weather forecasts? Science. Like roads and cars? Science. Like the phone on which you're probably reading this? Science. Like healthcare, like Tylenol, antibiotics, surgery, heck, even toothpaste and shampoo? Science. Like buildings? Science. Like not having to push a plow across a field all day? Science. Like things that are manufactured, like probably everything you see lying around you at home or wherever you are? Science. Basically, if you like anything in the modern world, then either you support science or you're oblivious or a hypocrite or both.
Author: SirsatShake
